nodes.text: Aivela's Crest was a location within the Eternal Empire of Zakuul, named after Aivela, one of Zakuulan Old Gods. At one point during their romantic relationship, the Immortal Emperor Valkorion sang to Senya Tirall on Aivela's Crest.

Aivela's Crest is only mentioned in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne if the player makes a Dark Side choice, leading to Senya's death on Voss. Its single mention does not specify whether Aivela's Crest is a celestial body, a geological feature or other type of location.
